title: feels like you are watching the first national treasure movie
review: This movie is action-packed with full entertainment, but it doesn't have anything new to offer. Halfway through the movie i thought i was watching the first movie national treasure movie.The movie follows pretty much the same sequel. They could have added something to spice it up a bit. Other than that the movie was pretty good. All the actors did a pretty good job.I don't suggest you buy it but rent it. This is a movie which you can only enjoy by seeing it one time. You will be bored when you see it the second time.SAve your money don't buy it, but rent it.
